info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:56PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Gusty surface winds will impact portions of northwestern Mesa County through 700 PM MDT... At 553 PM MDT, gusty outflow winds from nearby thunderstorms were causing gusts of 45 mph in the Grand Valley. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These winds will remain over the Grand Valley in Mesa County, including the following locations... Loma, Fruitvale, Grand Junction, Mack, Clifton, Orchard Mesa, Whitewater and Redlands. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 8 and 39. U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 32 and 50. Colorado 139 between mile markers 1 and 8. Colorado 141 between mile markers 150 and 162. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
